Transcript:
Customer: Do you have information on La Raza?
Agent: La raza is a spanish restaurant in the centre area. It is considered cheap
Customer: Can I get their address and phone number, please?
Agent: Certainly. They're at 4 - 6 Rose Crescent. Their number is 01223464550. I can help you book a table if you'd like. Or is there anything else you need?
Customer: I could use your help finding a train for Saturday that leaves after 11:00.
Agent: There are 278 trains that leave after 11:00 on Saturday. Do you have a particular departure and arrival location?
Customer: I need to go from leicester to cambridge.
Agent: It looks like train TR6210 will be leaving Leicester at 11:09 on Saturday and will arrive to Cambridge at 12:54. Can I help you with anything else?
Customer: Does the train allow for bikes?
Agent: Only folding bicycles are permitted aboard the train; park other bikes at the station. Do you have any other questions about your trip?
Customer: Is there parking for my bike at the station?
Agent: Yes, the station offers bike parking facilities. Do you have any other questions I can answer?
Customer: What's the travel time on that trip? I really dislike math.
Agent: The travel time for that route is 105 minutes. Is there anything else I can help you with?
Customer: Is it possible to get a high chair for my baby at La raza?
Agent: No, La Raza does not have high chairs available. Can I help you with anything else?
Customer: No, thanks . That should be all, thank you!

Transcript:
Customer: I am staying in the centre of cambridge, can you tell me about places to go there?
Agent: Sure, what type of place interests you?
Customer: It doesn't matter but can I get their entrance fee.
Agent: Castle Galleries is located in the centre of town and are free to enter.
Customer: OK, that sounds great. I also need a train to get me to Cambridge.
Agent: I have several options but if you let me know your preferred departure point, day and time i can recommend the best option for you.
Customer: I will be departing from Kings Lynn on Saturday.
Agent: i found 19.what time would you like to go
Customer: I need to leave after 20:00.
Agent: I have 4 trains that match your criteria. The first leaves at 20:11, then 21:11. 22:11 and 23:11. Which one would you like to book?
Customer: Does the station provide parking?
Agent: Yes, parking is available at the station. Check with your station if there will be a charge. Do you still want to make a reservation?
Customer: How can I use my season ticket for the train booking?
Agent: Yes, you will need show your season ticket at the station's ticket office to acquire a physical ticket. Can I assist you in making a reservation?
Customer: Please book the one for 21:11 please.
Agent: Okay. Booking was successful. Your reference number is CJNO95ZP. Anything else?
Customer: Would it be possible to go ahead and reserve my seat?
Agent: Sorry, you can't reserve a seat on the train. Is there anything I can do for you?
Customer: That is all I needed. Thanks!

Transcript:
Customer: I have some questions about attractions, today.

Agent: Are you looking for a museum to visit? Or would you prefer a college?
Customer: Surprise me :) I need the address, postcode and the entrance fee. I also need a vegetarian restaurant with a moderate price range.
Agent: I would recommend churchhill college. It's free to enter. The address is storey's way. The post code is cb30ds. What area should the restaurant be in?
Customer: i don't mind where it is as long as they have vegetarian food.
Agent: I'm sorry, I have no vegetarian restaurants available. Is there something else you would be interested in?
Customer: Could you look for an Indian restaurant?
Agent: There is an indian restaurant called Meghna in the west. It's moderately priced. Would you like me to book a table?
Customer: Can you confirm whether the restaurant can accommodate handicapped patrons?
Agent: Meghna is wheelchair accessible at this restaurant. What do you need to know about it?
Customer: Do they accept Visa?
Agent: Yes, they accept Visa for payment. Do you want me to make you a reservation?
Customer: No just provide me their address and phone number.
Agent: sure they are located at 205 Victoria Rd Chesterton, phone is 01223727410, something else today?
Customer: I'm going to need a taxi to get to the two places.
Agent: Where do you want to depart and arrive and what time?
Customer: I'm going to need to leave the museum by 9:00.
Agent: Your are booked, look for a red volvo, if you need to contact them, their number is 07134286519, any further questions?
Customer: Will I be able to pay for this taxi with my Visa
Agent: Yes, you can pay with your Visa card. Do you have any other questions?
Customer: Thank you so much. I don't think I have any questions right now.
Agent: Can I look up anything else for you?
Customer: No thank you.

Customer: Does Prezzo offer delivery services?

Transcript:
Agent: What type of movies do you enjoy?
Customer: I really like romantic comedies. They're my favorite.
Agent: What appeals to you with these type of movies?
Customer: They are funny. Usually a little lighthearted, usually has possibly heartwarming, has a happy ending, so it's nothing that will really get you down, and it's usually something that you'll leave feeling good after watching. They're also really easy to watch.
Agent: That's awesome
Agent: Is there a specific movie you enjoy from this genre?
Customer: Yeah, While You Were Sleeping is one of my favorites.
Agent: What did you like about this movie?
Customer: It was an unexpected delight. It is extremely well acted and well written, but it's it's sort of an untraditional. It's not a traditional romantic comedy. It is sort of a romantic comedy paired with a family comedy, and it really works, but it's it's it's very endearing.
Agent: It's nice to see movies not follow a formula and go out of the box
Customer: Yes, very true.
Agent: Are there any type of movies that you don't enjoy?
Customer: I'm not the biggest fan of scary movies.
Agent: What about these movies is unappealing?
Customer: I just don't enjoy being scared. It could It can cause me to have nightmares, so in order to actually watch a scary movie, I have to sort of remind myself that it's fake, which sort of takes away the point of watching it in the first place, so I usually just avoid them.

Customer: If that's a horror film

Customer: It has literally things that will give me nightmares. Like the pictures from it, I've watched a few minutes here and there, and it is It's so disgusting and definitely things that I would somehow work into my dreams that would turn into nightmares. So despite it being well acted and one of Sigourney Weaver's best movies ever, I just can't.
Agent: Have you seen the movie Crazy Rich Asians?
Customer: Yeah, that's a great movie.
Agent: What did you like or dislike about this title?
Customer: First of all its great because it has a cast that's Asian which is very unusual for a romantic comedy.
